meaningMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.
readingMnemonic: Since this word is made up of a single kanji, it probably uses the kun'yomi reading. You did not learn this reading, so here's a mnemonic to help you to remember: "How many things are in this <vocabulary>cluster</vocabulary>?" asks your boss. "Just a <reading>few sah</reading>," (ふさ) you reply.
